tool.name: OGS: geometryToGmshGeo
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'geometryToGmshGeo'.
tool.command: geometryToGmshGeo --input '$input' #if str($max_points_in_quadtree_leaf): --max_points_in_quadtree_leaf '$max_points_in_quadtree_leaf' #end if #if str($mesh_density_scaling_at_points): --mesh_density_scaling_at_points '$mesh_density_scaling_at_points' #end if #if str($mesh_density_scaling_at_stations): --mesh_density_scaling_at_stations '$mesh_density_scaling_at_stations' #end if #if str($average_point_density): --average_point_density '$average_point_density' #end if $homogeneous --output output_1.geo --write_merged_geometries output_2.gml

param.name: average_point_density
param.label: average point density

tool.help: This tool runs the **geometryToGmshGeo** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
